title: Ticket #1684: getcwd() on AIX can't handle long paths
description:
On AIX, getcwd() can't handle paths longer than 1023 characters. If the path of the current working directory's path is longer than that and you give getcwd() a buffer of size 1024 or larger, it will return success with a truncated path (as much as will fit in 1023 characters).

It would be nice if Condor's condor_getcwd() could detect this case and determine the real path.
